description:
The second incarnation of the very popular NARUTO anime. It covers Part II of the manga storyline which takes place two years after Part I (which ends with the Sasuke Retrieval arc, episodes 107-135 of the first TV series). The anime chronology differs from the manga as the Shippuuden series happens two and a half years after the end of the first Naruto series.
The story revolves mainly around Uzumaki Naruto`s and Haruno Sakura`s new adventures and their search for Uchiha Sasuke after he left Konoha-gakure (Leaf Village) to gain Orochimaru`s power. The plot also shows a more active Akatsuki in their quest for obtaining all the tailed beasts.
After his failed attempt to retrieve Sasuke, Naruto learns that circumstances have granted him slightly less than three years to prepare for a confrontation with Orochimaru, who has to wait that much time before he can transfer into Sasuke`s body. Naruto also must prepare for his eventual confrontation with Akatsuki, who are after the demon sealed within him. To prepare, Naruto leaves the village and undergoes intensive training under Jiraiya. At the same time, Sakura becomes Tsunade`s apprentice, and Sasuke trains under Orochimaru. Thus, all three members of the original Team 7 are now training under one of the Legendary Sannin.

REGULAR.description:
A figure passes through the gates. It’s an older Naruto, who has returned from a long training journey with Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki is back!
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Sakura team up and challenge Kakashi to a survival challenge to show off their progress.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto’s and Sakura’s combined skills force Kakashi to use his Sharingan right off the bat. Naruto masterfully unleashes his jutsu one after another.
Source: crunchyroll

Gaara is quick to detect Deidara’s presence, and an aerial battle ensues with Deidara on his giant bird and Gaara atop sand.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Sakura defeat Kakashi in the survival challenge. Tsunade assigns them to a three-man squad led by Kakashi, who tells them they are now his equals.
Source: crunchyroll

In order to protect his village from Deidara’s explosive clay, Gaara uses his chakra to create a giant sand shield.
Source: crunchyroll

Gaara, his strength completely exhausted, is whisked away by Deidara. Kankuro ignores Baki’s efforts to stop him and immediately sets out in pursuit with a platoon to rescue Gaara.
Source: crunchyroll

On her way to the Sand Village, Temari encounters Kakashi and his team. Kakashi admonishes Naruto when he tries to rush ahead…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`équipe de Kakashi passe à l`attaque

REGULAR.description:
An urgent message from the Sand Village detailing the Akatsuki’s kidnapping of the Kazekage reaches the Hidden Leaf Village. Tsunade wastes no time in ordering Team Kakashi to the Sand Village.
Source: crunchyroll

The Sand ninja fight against time to treat Kankuro. Even the Sand’s poison expert, Granny Chiyo, is baffled. The only hope lies with the reinforcements sent by Tsunade.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arts des sceaux : les neuf dragons fantômes
Sealing Technique - Complete Nine Mystical Dragon Seal

REGULAR.description:
Sakura treats a critically ill Kankuro. After extensive training she’s now a full-fledged Medic Ninja, and Sakura amazes everyone with her sure, steady hands.
Source: crunchyroll

Pakkun finds the hideout of the Akatsuki. Team Kakashi and Temari prepare to set out to get Gaara back, but Temari is ordered to stay behind and help guard the village.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Kakashi encounter Itachi Uchiha, who had dealt them a bitter defeat in the past. Kakashi warns everyone not to look into Itachi’s Sharingan Eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

Guy prepares to use a forbidden secret jutsu. Meanwhile, Naruto falls under Itachi’s genjutsu, and all the anti-genjutsu training he underwent with Jiraiya races through Naruto’s mind.
Source: crunchyroll

Granny Chiyo and Sakura  rescue Naruto from Itachi’s genjutsu. Without a moment’s delay, Kakashi begins a counterattack.
Source: crunchyroll

Chiyo and Kakashi realize that the attack was just a diversion, and that the Akatsuki have already begun the process of extracting the Tailed Beast from Gaara. Granny Chiyo explains to Naruto and Sakura the connection between the Tailed Beast and the Jinchûriki...
Source: crunchyroll

Teams Kakashi and Guy take a short rest. Granny Chiyo watches Naruto dozing off and is reminded of Sasori as a child. The pursuit resumes, and when Chiyo wonders why Naruto puts such effort into rescuing Gaara…
Source: crunchyroll

Teams Kakashi and Guy reach the Akatsuki hideout. They hurry to infiltrate but are thwarted by a five-seal barrier. The only way to break the barrier is to remove all five seals at once.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 突入! ボタンフックエントリー

REGULAR.description:
Breaking the five-seal barrier set off a trap, which now has Team Guy battling amazingly accurate copies of themselves. Back at the Akatsuki hideout, Deidara and Sasori struggle to take the Nine-Tail Jinchûriki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`équipe de Gai contre l`équipe de Gai ?
罠[トラップ]作動! ガイ班の敵

REGULAR.description:
At last, the showdown between the old woman and her grandson begins. Sakura is confused by Sasori’s strange appearance, and Granny Chiyo explains that this is Hiruko…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiruko contre les deux femmes ninjas

REGULAR.description:
Granny Chiyo and Sakura manage to expose Sasori, who amazingly looks no older than he did twenty years earlier. Chiyo is even more shocked at the second puppet that Sasori produces.
Source: crunchyroll

Sakura is caught by Sasori’s tactic and surrounded by a poison cloud. But she uses a Paper Bomb to blow herself free from the poisonous fumes.
Source: crunchyroll

Chiyo and Sakura take cover, and Sasori wastes no time unleashing a ruthless attack. Chiyo fights back to protect Sakura, but in an instant the Father and Mother puppets are sealed by the Iron Sand.
Source: crunchyroll

Sakura counters the Iron Sand attack of the Third Kazekage puppet with superhuman strength. She learned from Tsunade that the most important skill of a Medic Ninja is the ability to evade an attack.
Source: crunchyroll

Sakura destroys the Third Kazekage puppet thanks to a secret antidote she had taken. Sakuro explains to a surprised Granny Chiyo that this antidote converts the poison into harmless protein and is effective for about three minutes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Between Life and Death in Three Minutes
Trois minutes pour vivre ou mourir

REGULAR.description:
Sakura and Granny Chiyo are engaged in a fierce battle with Sasori, who is able turn himself into a human puppet. They somehow bring Sasori down within the time limit, but he ends up reviving.
Source: crunchyroll

Although stung with poison herself, Granny Chiyo uses the last of the antidote on Sakura. Mocking the tender scene between Granny Chiyo and Sakura, Sasori attempts to end Granny Chiyo`s life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Traum, der nicht wahr werden konnte
The Dream that Couldn`t Come True

REGULAR.description:
Team Guy senses the result of the Sakura and Granny Chiyo’s desperate struggle while still in battle with his deadly copy. Although Guy’s team members are showing fatigue, their copies remain strong!
Source: crunchyroll

Sakura hurries to get to Naruto with Granny Chiyo, who is suffering from the poison. The members of Team Guy rush to assist Team Kakashi.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto loses all reason to anger and is gradually taken over by the Nine-Tailed Fox Spirit. Having been forewarned by Jiraiya, Kakashi narrowly manages to suppress the Nine-Tailed Fox.
Source: crunchyroll

Relying on Naruto`s power, Granny Chiyo performs the Transmigration Jutsu on Gaara. Sakura is saddened when she realizes the cost of this jutsu.
Source: crunchyroll

Gaara and his rescuers make a triumphant return to the Hidden Sand Village. After paying their respects at Granny Chiyo`s grave, Naruto and the Leaf ninja reluctantly take their leave.
Source: crunchyroll

Everyone has returned to the Hidden Leaf Village. Kakashi is hospitalized for a week due to the strain caused by his Mangekyo Sharingan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新たなる目標[ターゲット]

REGULAR.description:
After attacking Naruto, Sai predicts that they will meet again soon, then vanishes. Tsunade meets with the village elders, Homura and Koharu…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The New Team Kakashi is Formed!

REGULAR.description:
Naruto is enraged when he discovers that Sai attacked him in order to test his strength. Sakura pulls them apart, but tensions are running high between the members of Team Kakashi.
Source: crunchyroll

The new Team Kakashi heads for Tenchikyo. To Naruto, Sai is just temporarily filling in for Sasuke. When Sai shows his contempt for Sasuke, the antagonism comes to a head.
Source: crunchyroll

Sakura comes across Sai working on an abstract painting. He tells her that he`s unable to give it a title. Bothered by his manner, Sakura finds an unusual picture book among Sai`s things.
Source: crunchyroll

In preparation for Tenchikyo, Yamato conducts a half-day simulation in order to get a grasp on the fighting skills and jutsu of Team Kakashi. Sai abandons Naruto to conclude the simulated mission successfully.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 模擬戦闘訓練[シミュレーション]

REGULAR.description:
The day for capturing the spy is finally here. Just as planned, Yamato takes on Sasori`s likeness and waits until the Akatsuki spy appears. The spy turns out to be none other than Kabuto.
Source: crunchyroll

Faced with Orochimaru, his sworn enemy, Naruto suddenly releases the power of his Nine-Tailed Fox. When Yamato sees Naruto`s fourth tail appear, he recalls Jiraiya`s tale of how he nearly lost his life to the transformed Naruto.
Source: crunchyroll

When his third tail appears, all that Naruto can see is Orochimaru. He is blind even to his teammates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le début de la mission secrète

REGULAR.description:
With the release of his fourth tail, Naruto completely loses his awareness and is overtaken by destructive impulses.
Source: crunchyroll

Although he has changed almost completely into his animal form and has lost all awareness, Naruto refuses to give up the idea of bringing Sasuke home.
Source: crunchyroll

Taking advantage of the confusion, Sai makes contact with Orochimaru. After reviewing the contents of the documents given to him, Orochimaru decides to take Sai back to the hideout.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Sakura are shocked when they hear that Danzo`s goal is to work with Orochimaru to once again attempt to defeat the Leaf Village.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto is shocked to learn that he was the one responsible for the destruction around them and for Sakura`s injuries.
Source: crunchyroll

Sai shudders when he finally meets Sasuke face to face in Orochimaru`s hideout. The list that Sai gave to Orochimaru lists the members of the Anbu Black Ops, the corps under the direct control of the Hokage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sneak In! Den of the Poisonous Snake
Vorstoß in das Nest der Giftschlange
潜入! 毒蛇の巣窟[アジト]

REGULAR.description:
Team Kakashi is able to find Sai with Yamato guiding them. They immediately begin questioning Sai about Danzo`s plans for destroying the Leaf Village, and surprisingly, Sai divulges everything.
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto carries out a surprise attack on Team Kakashi to take back Sai, but a change has come over Sai since Sakura pointed out his contradictions.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto, while nursing his injuries caused by the release of the Nine-Tailed Fox, searches frantically for Sasuke. Seeing this, Sai recalls the feelings he once had for his older brother and finally manages to complete his unfinished picture.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sketch Book Tells a Story
絵本が語る物語[ストーリー]

REGULAR.description:
Team Kakashi are stunned to learn that Sai`s true mission is to kill Sasuke.  Naruto wants to believe that the smile Sai showed them was real, but there is a possibility that it was all an act.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Kakashi finally have their wish to be reunited with Sasuke granted. Although it has been three long years, Sasuke`s feelings have not changed. His ultimate goal is to get revenge against his older brother, Itachi.
Source: crunchyroll

Sasuke`s desire for revenge remains firm, no matter how hard Naruto tries to talk him out of it. Yamato tries to take Sasuke by force, but interference by Orochimaru brings things to a quick close.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto has a strange nightmare several days after their failure to bring Sasuke home. Even after he awakens wisps of the dream keep haunting him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sai gewinnt eine Erkenntnis – und ein Veilchen!

REGULAR.description:
Naruto begins to train with Kakashi. Kakashi finds it exhausting working with Naruto, who can’t understand anything explained to him.
Source: crunchyroll

Learning that his chakra is of the "wind" type that is outstanding for fighting, Naruto puts more effort into his training.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Kakashi is ordered to resolve the frequent vandalizing of graves at the Fire Temple. When it becomes clear that the vandals aren’t after the possessions buried with the dead, Yamato suspects that they want the corpses of the ninja buried in the four hidden tombs near Fire Temple.
Source: crunchyroll

At the Fire Temple, Chiriku explains to Team Kakashi that the hidden tombs hold the guards of the Land of Fire’s feudal lord. At one time Chiriku and Asuma were members of that organization.
Source: crunchyroll

Word comes that the last of the hidden graves has been broken into. Naruto and the others go after the coffin, but it turns out to be a trap.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Kakashi is split up by the enemy`s Earth Summoning Jutsu. They are forced to fight the attacking assassins, but the enemy has the advantage since they know the lay of the land.
Source: crunchyroll

Sora confronts Furido, the mysterious figure who has broken into the hidden graves. Impressed by Sora’s unusual strength, he admonishes him, “You should reevaluate how you use that power Heaven has blessed you with,” and disappears, leaving him with a cryptic message that he is an old friend of his father.
Source: crunchyroll

Yamato believes that the assailants were not grave robbers but were after Sora. He decides to appoint Sora to Team Kakashi as a temporary stand-in for the injured Sai.
Source: crunchyroll

By chance, Naruto and Sora get Asuma to coach them. Under the guidance of Asuma’s iron fist, they immerse themselves in training with Wind Chakra.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsunade catches Danzo in a secret meeting with a ninja from the Hidden Rain Village. But the ninja turns out to be a spy for the Hidden Leaf.
Source: crunchyroll

Under cover of a giant power outage, Furido begins his assault on the Hidden Leaf. The village immediately goes on alert, but Furido’s men put up a barrier, and everyone in the village is trapped inside.
Source: crunchyroll

In order to stop the impending disaster, Asuma rushes toward the electric generator system. There he sees the Guardian Shinobi Twelve who have come to life once more through Revival Jutsu after their graves were robbed.
Source: crunchyroll

Sora is speechless when he discovers that Furido not only intends to assassinate the Hokage but plans to totally annihilate Hidden Leaf Village.
Source: crunchyroll

Throughout the village, Kitane’s fellow Guardian Shinobi with the Lightning Jutsu set up Limelight.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Asuma catch up to Sora, only to find him shrouded in ominous chakra and undergoing a change.
Source: crunchyroll

Furido’s true form belongs to Kazuma, one of the Guardian Shinobi Twelve who had planned the coup d’état. Asuma puts his honor on the line and goes back ten years to battle Furido once more.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto desperately tries to suppress Nine Tails’ chakra and get through to Sora’s heart and soul. Naruto’s comrades are helpless against Sora’s powerful chakra and can only stand by and watch.
Source: crunchyroll

Work continues in Hidden Leaf Village to erase the scars of battle. As he watches Konohamaru and the others helping with the reconstruction, Iruka sees how his students have matured.
Source: crunchyroll

With Kakashi’s return, Naruto resumes training for his new jutsu. Kakashi explains that the transformation training will enter the next stage.
Source: crunchyroll

The lone surviving priest is carried into Hidden Leaf Village where he reports the destruction of the Fire Temple.
Source: crunchyroll

In order to capture the Akatsuki, the Hidden Leaf cast a net that even an ant could not crawl through. Still, the Akatsuki elude them and frustrate Tsunade to no end.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto is learning the elements of Wind Style Jutsu, and Kakashi lectures him on the difficulties of developing a new jutsu.
Source: crunchyroll

Asuma and his team finally confront Hidan, and a battle ensues. They fight with all their strength but are shocked at Hidan’s power.
Source: crunchyroll

Hidan releases a baffling jutsu, and Asuma bears the brunt of the attack. The jutsu is a special trick which links Hidan with Asuma’s body.
Source: crunchyroll

Shikamaru unravels the secret of Hidan’s jutsu just in time, and Asuma attacks with all his being.
Source: crunchyroll

Asuma is mortally wounded by Hidan’s jutsu, and the Akatsuki have the rest of the Hidden Leaf in a bind.
Source: crunchyroll

In a faraway land, the Akatsuki reveal their true aim of world conquest. And back at Hidden Leaf Village, Shikamaru gives his report of the mission to Tsunade.
Source: crunchyroll

Asuma’s funeral is held in Hidden Leaf Village amid deep sadness. Shikamaru is the lone absentee, unable to get over the loss.
Source: crunchyroll

Kakashi and Team 10 set out to stop the Akatsuki. Tsunade considers Naruto’s Team 7 to be the ideal back-up for Team 10 and orders Naruto to perfect his new jutsu within 24 hours.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 標的捕捉[ターゲット・ロックオン]

REGULAR.description:
Shikamaru and Choji deliver the first blows in the battle, but they are thwarted by Kakuzu’s power. Kakashi counters Kakuzu’s trick and brings him down.
Source: crunchyroll

Shikamaru and his comrades desperately counter the Fire Jutsu offensive. But continuously using his Rasengan and Lightning Blade takes its toll on Kakashi.
Source: crunchyroll

Shikamaru battles Hidan alone, deep in the forest, and after depleting his chakra, sustains a deep wound. Hidan draws his blood as he lies near death.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Team Kakashi arrive just in time to assist Team Asuma. Sakura and Sai are ordered by Kakashi to aid Shikamaru, who is battling alone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: When You Curse Someone, You Dig Your Own Grave

REGULAR.description:
Ino and Choji are amazed at Naruto’s new jutsu, and Kakuzu senses the danger that it poses. But when released, the new jutsu dissipates before it reaches Kakuzu.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto’s uses his new jutsu to bring Kakuzu down. Tsunade welcomes the teams back home and orders Team Asuma and Team Yamato to take a break.
Source: crunchyroll

Just when peace has finally settled over the village word comes that Orochimaru’s hideout has been found. Tsunade orders Kakashi, Hinato, Shino, and Kiba on a search mission to find the hideout.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Jiraiya arrive at the hot springs resort. As an alternative to the Wind Style: Rasen Shuriken, Jiraiya suggests to Naruto the collaboration ninjutsu with a ninja toad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 発見 大蛇丸のアジト

REGULAR.description:
Inside Orochimaru’s hideout Guren witnesses Sasuke defeating a thousand opponents. Meanwhile, Kabuto and Yukimaru conduct their experiment to summon the Three-Tailed Beast.
Source: crunchyroll

Believing Naruto’s new jutsu is almost completed, Jiraiya heads off to investigate new information on the Akatsuki’s movements. His arm now healed, Naruto returns to the village to continue his training.
Source: crunchyroll

Staying behind at the hideout, Rinji and Gozu become aware of a shinobi following their tracks. At the same time, Kakashi and his team notice that the enemy is using a bat for surveillance.
Source: crunchyroll

At the Leaf Village Naruto is busy training with Gamakichi and Gamatatsu. But when he learns that Kakashi and the others are out on a mission to locate Orochimaru’s hideout, Naruto rushes to ask Tsunade if he can join the mission.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Yamato heads out to provide backup for Team Kakashi. Right before his departure Naruto gets a hint to perfect his new jutsu by entering Gamatatsu’s belly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Nebel, der alle Spuren beseitigt

REGULAR.description:
From the results of the analysis of the crystallized Parasitic insects, the enemies currently fighting Kakashi’s team are identified as users of  the Crystal Style, a rare type of jutsu. Still unclear on what Orochimaru’s objective is, Tsunade cannot hide her irritation and anxiety.
Source: crunchyroll

Shattering the force field with his newly mastered collaboration jutsu with the toads, Naruto and the reinforcement unit arrive at the battle site. But Naruto’s new jutsu is repulsed by Guren’s ability to crystallize fluids.
Source: crunchyroll

The Leaf ninja use The Bat to pursue Guren. Akamaru and Kiba detect a high level of chakra present at their destination. Convinced something abnormal is about to happen, Kakashi sends Naruto to the lake right before entering battle with the enemy.
Source: crunchyroll

Inside the heavy mist, the Leaf ninja manage to rendezvous with Naruto. The team tightens their guard when they learn that the mist surrounding the lake causes illusions. The team discovers that the enemy is after the Three-Tailed Beast, and faced with this unexpected development, Kakashi decides to ask for Tsunade’s guidance.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto enters the mist to seek out Yukimaru. Guren stays alert to protect Yukimaru, whose current situation prevents him from moving. When both sides meet, their emotion over Yukimaru sparks.
Source: crunchyroll

Reinforcements arrive from Leaf Village. The new mission from Tsunade: seal the Three-Tailed Beast so it won’t fall into anyone else’s hands and take Yukimaru whose powers are tied to the Tailed Beast into custody.
Source: crunchyroll

The Leaf ninja wish to seal the Three-Tailed Beast, and Guren’s team wishes to stop them at any cost. Shizune’s sealing team begins their search as they activate the The Four-Corner Sealing Barrier to trap the Three-Tailed Beast…
Source: crunchyroll

To protect the The Four-Corner Sealing Barrier necessary to seal the Three-Tailed Beast, Kakashi and Naruto wage their deadly battle against Guren. Sai fights a one-on-one battle with Gozu…
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto plans on breaking the Leaf’s The Four-Corner Sealing Barrier from the inside by using Yukimaru’s power and have the Three-Tailed Beast go on a rampage.
Source: crunchyroll

To protect Guren from the raging Three Tails, Yuukimaru exerts powers beyond his limits. Moved by his action, Guren now comes to regret her past sin of killing Yuukimaru’s mother.
Source: crunchyroll

To protect Yuukimaru, Naruto and Guren fight alongside each other against the Three-Tailed beast and are swallowed. Inside the beast is an unnatural world filled with limestone.
Source: crunchyroll

The Leaf ninja learn that Naruto is inside the Three-Tailed beast. With no other alternative but to trust Yuukimaru’s mystical senses, Kakashi and the others follow the boy’s guidance and attempt a rescue mission...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Weg nach draußen, den es nicht gibt!

REGULAR.description:
With the Three-Tailed Beast readily approaching, the Barrier Sealing team is point to make sure it doesn`t surface.  However, Kabuto - unwilling to fail Orochimaru - is out to recapture Yuukimaru at whatever the cost...
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto plots to have Three Tails crush the Leaf ninja by sacrificing Yuukimaru’s power and life. Controlled by Yuukimaru, Three Tails’ awesome power is about to break free from the seal, when an unexpected ally saves Shizune’s sealing team.
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto finally appears before Naruto. Learning that Orochimaru used Guren’s and Yuukimaru’s feelings for his own purposes, an enraged Naruto enters battle against Kabuto.
Source: crunchyroll

The Leaf ninja fall back and tend to their wounds. The battle has left everyone with serious injuries. Shizune examines Yuukimaru, who is in a coma, but his body is no longer able to control Three Tails.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Ort, an den man immer zurückkehren kann

REGULAR.description:
Orochimaru agonizes in pain at his hideout, now requiring level-ten medications just to sustain his body. Even with excruciating pain Orochimaru is preparing for his transference ritual, and Kabuto can feel Orochimaru’s further potential. Meanwhile Sasuke also senses the time is coming when he will have to face his mentor...
Source: crunchyroll

Orochimaru sheds his old body and transforms into a white serpent. As he attacks Sasuke to obtain his body, Orochimaru remembers the time he found the cast off skin of a white snake in front of his parents’ grave. Driven by his desire for the Sharingan, Orochimaru finally robs Sasuke of his freedom...
Source: crunchyroll

Sasuke has defeated Orochimaru. He then frees Suigetsu, a man trapped inside a water tank, and tells the man to join him. But Suigetsu does not immediately take up Sasuke’s offer…
Source: crunchyroll

Sasuke and Suigetsu visit the southern hideout to recruit their next member, Karin. Suigetsu is surprised at the hideout’s low security level but is told that no prisoners can escape thanks to Karin’s abilities. What is Karin’s power that allows her to maintain order and an iron defense?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il guardiano della prigione di ferro

REGULAR.description:
Sasuke and his team head for the northern hideout to recruit their next member, Jugo. On the way, Karin explains that the northern hideout is a site for conducting horrific human experiments. A ninja with abnormal homicidal impulses, Jugo is the sole carrier of the enzyme necessary to create Orochimaru’s curse mark...
Source: crunchyroll

Slipping past the riot, Sasuke arrives at Jugo’s cell. But Jugo refuses to be released, even going as far as to say he rather die a lonely death than to leave the hideout.
Source: crunchyroll

"More than ten years ago, the rule of the Five Great Shinobi Nations was destabilized, throwing the world into a conflict later to be known as the Third Great Ninja War. The future Fourth Hokage Minato Namikaze assigns young Kakashi, Obito of the Uchiha clan, and Rin, a medical ninja, on a mission to Kannabi Bridge..."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakashi Gaiden: Senjou no Boy`s Life!
Kakashi`s Gaiden - The Battlefield of a Boy`s Life!
カカシ外伝~戦場のボーイズライフ~

REGULAR.description:
Obito ignores Kakashi’s order to continue with the mission and leaves to save Rin, who was kidnapped by the Rock ninja. But the enemies detect Obito’s arrival and defeat him. Kakashi arrives at the last minute and saves Obito…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakashi Gaiden: Senjou no Boy`s Life!
Kakashi`s Gaiden - The Battlefield of a Boy`s Life!
カカシ外伝~戦場のボーイズライフ~

REGULAR.description:
After hunting down the Four Tails, Itachi and Kisame are summoned by the leader of the Akatsuki. The leader announces the death of Orochimaru to the gathered members and the possibility of his killer, Sasuke, setting his sights on the Akatsuki organization....
Source: crunchyroll

Under Kakashi’s command, the Leaf ninja set off to find Itachi. Using Kakashi’s ninja hounds, they gather as much information as they can on Itachi. Meanwhile, the members of the Hebi also scatter to look for information on Itachi. Led by the ninja hound tracking Sasuke’s scent, Sakura arrives in town and draws near to Karin.
Source: crunchyroll

Upon encountering one another, Sasuke and Deidara engage in battle. After exchanging a few blows to test Sasuke’s strength, Deidara conjures up his specialty clay dragon and wages long-range attacks against Sasuke from high above. With Tobi’s backup support, the battle seems to be going to Deidara.
Source: crunchyroll

Determined to destroy the Sharingan to rid himself of the taste of defeat he received from Itachi, Deidara unleashes his biggest attack, the C4 Karura. Created to kill Itachi, this fierce weapon is capable of destroying living beings from the inside using millions of nano-sized bombs. Can Sasuke escape this attack fueled by Deidara’s determination to destroy the Sharingan?
Source: crunchyroll

Sasuke goes missing after being caught by Deidara’s suicidal bombing. Sensing his disappearance, Jugo, Karin, and Suigetsu race to Sasuke’s last location, where the three Hebi members discover...?
Source: crunchyroll

Leaf ninja, she notifies the others and the Hebi members quickly leave the inn. To allow Sasuke to focus on his coming battle with Itachi, Karin comes up with a plan to keep the Leaf ninja occupied.
Source: crunchyroll

During the reign of the Second Hokage, the young Jiraiya, Orochimaru, and Tsunade are assigned to Hiruzen Sarutobi’s platoon as Genins. Fascinated by Sarutobi’s summoning jutsu, Jiraiya immerses himself in mastering the transportation technique. While training, Jiraiya accidentally transports himself to Mount Myoboku, opening the path to fulfill his destiny.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tale of a Gutsy Ninja - The Jiraiya Ninja Chronicles
ド根性忍伝 ~自来也忍法帖~前編

REGULAR.description:
Jiraiya’s journey to seek out a student is postponed due to the outbreak of the Third Great Ninja War. Jiraiya joins Tsunade and Orochimaru to battle the Village Hidden in the Rain. Following the battle, the three ninja are named the “Legendary Sannin,” a title given to them by the enemy Hanzo of the Great Salamander himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tale of a Gutsy Ninja - The Jiraiya Ninja Chronicles
ド根性忍伝 ~自来也忍法帖~後編

REGULAR.description:
Jiraiya successfully infiltrates the Hidden Rain Village by hiding inside the toad Gamagoro. He sets out to gather information but finds no indications of a civil war occurring within the village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In incognito al Villaggio della Pioggia
Infiltrate! The Village Hidden in the Rain

REGULAR.description:
Foreseeing a possible battle, Jiraiya takes precautionary measures by releasing the scroll toad that commands the key to Naruto’s Eight-Signed Seal.
Source: crunchyroll

Jiraiya battles to defeat his former student Pain, who is now driven by his twisted ideals as an Akatsuki member.
Source: crunchyroll

Jiraiya completes his Sage Mode transformation to battle the three Pains.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meeting the Six Paths of Pain

REGULAR.description:
Having lost his arm, Jiraiya is outmatched by the six Pains now appearing before him. Of the six, the one called Tendo is revealed to be Jiraiya’s former student Yahiko. Jiraiya is still puzzled by the Rinnegan’s true powers, but before he can gather his thoughts, he is forced back into battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Tale of the Gallant Jiraiya

REGULAR.description:
Sasuke arrives at one of the Akatsuki hideouts, having followed in Itachi’s footsteps. When Sasuke is about to enter the hideout alone, his older brother Itachi finally appears before him…
Source: crunchyroll

While Itachi waits for Sasuke in the Uchiha hideout, he recalls the past incident that led to his defection from the Leaf Village. When Sasuke arrives, the fated battle begins between the two brothers.
Source: crunchyroll

Following their fierce genjutsu battle with the Sharingan, Itachi explains the secret behind the most powerful ocular jutsu, the Mangekyo Sharingan, and the history of the Uchiha clan…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`ombre et la lumière du sharingan
Luce e tenebre dello Sharingan ipnotico
Mangekyou Sharingan no Hikari to Yami
The Light & Dark of the Mangekyo Sharingan
万華鏡写輪眼の光と闇

REGULAR.description:
Sasuke loses his left eye to Itachi, but it turns out to be a genjutsu created by the Mangekyo Sharingan. Breaking free of the Tsukuyomi by force, Sasuke makes a furious comeback against the injured Itachi.
Source: crunchyroll

At the climax of the battle, both Itachi and Sasuke run out of chakra. However, Sasuke reveals that his actions up until now were only a preparation for his final jutsu.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and his comrades find themselves held up by Tobi, whose strange jutsu is more than just a simple genjutsu.
Source: crunchyroll

In the Akatsuki hideout Sasuke comes face to face with Madara. Announcing himself as Itachi’s accomplice from that fateful night, Madara goes on to tell Sasuke the truth about Itachi that he could never have known.
Source: crunchyroll

The Uchiha clan was plotting a coup d’etat. The story as told by Madara leaves Sasuke at a loss for words. Because of his gifted talent, Itachi was forced to suffer, torn between his loyalties to the Leaf Village and the Uchiha clan.
Source: crunchyroll

Flame from the Amaterasu still remains on the battlefield as Naruto and his teammates continue to search for Sasuke. But despite the search team’s best efforts, they cannot find any trace of him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Battle at Thunder Cloud Gorge

REGULAR.description:
The Taka split up with the Akatsuki to hunt down the remaining Tailed Beast. At the Land of Lightning they go up against Killer Bee, whose attack utilizing Lightning Style and seven blades proves to be more than a match for them.
Source: crunchyroll

The Leaf ninja fail to capture Itachi and also lose track of Sasuke. Calling off their pursuit, the team is heading back to the village when an urgent assignment from Lady Tsunade comes in. The mission stems from a treaty between the Third Hokage and the En no Gyoja of the Tsuchigumo Clan...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lady Hotaru und der rätselhafte Wanderer

REGULAR.description:
Naruto and his teammates are assigned to escort Hotaru, En no Gyoja’s granddaughter, to the Tsuchigumo Clan’s village located in the mountains. But Hotaru’s mind is still attached to Utakata, who left after Naruto’s arrival…
Source: crunchyroll

Having arrived at the village, Hotaru parts with Naruto and his team. But the Magaki Troops are one step ahead and threaten Hotaru to hand over the forbidden jutsu. Utakata appears, and Shiranami recognizes him as a bounty listed in the Hidden Mist’s bingo book...
Source: crunchyroll

Yamato and Sai recognize their opponents as trackers from the Hidden Mist Village, but Naruto attacks without questioning. The Hidden Mist demands Utakata be handed over to them in exchange for Hotaru.
Source: crunchyroll

Hotaru is brought back to the fort in Mount Katsuragi. Naruto, outraged to learn the forbidden jutsu was embedded inside Hotaru, demands an explanation from Tonbei. But it was none other than Hotaru herself who wished for this.
Source: crunchyroll

Believing Shiranami’s story, Hotaru writes a parting letter addressed to Utakata and leaves Mount Katsuragi. Meanwhile Naruto, still searching for Shiranami, falls into the Magaki Troops’ trap but manages to escape thanks to help from Utakata.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Utakata successfully enter the Tsuchigumo village thanks to help from Sakura, Sai, and Yamato. Utakata senses the chakra filling the atmosphere and terrain behaving oddly, and together with Naruto, they enter the cave where the anomaly is originating.
Source: crunchyroll

Hotaru, under the control of Shiranami’s jutsu, uses the Forbidden Jutsu against Naruto and Utakata. Shiranami trembles with joy, having witnessed the power of the Forbidden Jutsu, while Hotaru is consumed by deep despair.
Source: crunchyroll

Returning from the mission, Naruto recollects his strange encounter with Itachi. What did the now deceased Itachi wish to tell him? As Naruto ponders this, Kakashi makes an abrupt visit.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto wanders the streets of the Leaf Village, grief stricken over the death of Jiraiya. Unable to overcome his feeling of loss, Naruto traces back through his memories of Jiraiya. What can help the heartbroken Naruto get back on his feet?
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and his friends successfully decipher the code Jiraiya left behind with the help of some information Naruto has. The crew immediately calls Fukasaku over, but the message is not enough to solve the mystery of Pain.
Source: crunchyroll

At Mount Myoboku, Naruto begins his Sage Jutsu training under Fukasaku. The first challenge is “Don’t move.” Fukasaku explains that an extensive amount of time is necessary in order to take in nature energy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Weg zum Jutsu der Weisen

REGULAR.description:
Naruto continues his Sage training at Mount Myoboku, but with very slow progress. Fukasaku runs out of patience and suggests they move on to the next training…
Source: crunchyroll

Shikamaru and the others wait for the information Jiraiya brought back to be analyzed. The Hidden Leaf ninja continue their data analysis, when disaster strikes the village—
Source: crunchyroll

The Leaf Village is under heavy attack from Pain and Konan. Hearing the Akatsuki attack, Tsunade attempts to contact Fukasaku…
Source: crunchyroll

In one area of the village, Kakashi enters battle against Tendo Pain, but he can’t keep up with Tendo’s mysterious attacks. Shurado joins the fight, and Kakashi struggles with the two-on-one disadvantage.
Source: crunchyroll

The Leaf Village is under heavy attack from the Akatsuki. Underneath the village Danzo takes action to achieve his ambition. Meanwhile, searching through the Rain ninja’s mind, Inoichi Yamanaka is about to stumble upon valuable information.
Source: crunchyroll

Konohamaru, Moegi, and Udon are shocked to see the disaster that has struck their home village. But to fulfill their duties as genin, each races out to direct the villagers to a safe location.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein kleiner Held mit großem Mut
Mon prénom est Sarutobi, mon nom Konohamaru
Sei wa Sarutobi, Na wa Konohamaru!
Surname is Sarutobi, given name is Konohamaru
姓は猿飛, 名は木ノ葉丸!

REGULAR.description:
Tsunade comes face to face with Tendo Pain on the rooftop of the Hokage mansion. When Pain demands the Nine Tails be handed over, Tsunade refuses. However, Pain uses the Ningendo’s power to learn of Naruto’s current location in Mount Myoboku. Tsunade clenches at the sight of the growing number of casualties within the Leaf. But Pain, who condemns the Leaf’s arrogance as a major nation, makes the choice to deliver catastrophic damage against the Leaf Village to teach them what true pain is.
Source: crunchyroll

Sensing danger at hand, Naruto, along with Fukasaku, rushes back to the Leaf Village from Mount Myoboku. But what they see is the remains of the Leaf Village, leveled beyond recognition.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto hits Pain with his Sage Jutsu-perfected Wind Style Rasen Shuriken. Although he succeeds in defeating Ningendo, the remaining Pain quickly confronts him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danger ! Le mode ermite s`est éteint
危機(ピンチ)! 消えた仙人モード

REGULAR.description:
Gamabunta and the other toads are defeated while Naruto is captured by Pain. Naruto attempts to fight back with Sage Jutsu, but Gakido sucks out his chakra, forcing him to go out of Sage Mode.
Source: crunchyroll

Fukasaku and Shima fall in battle, leaving Naruto open to be captured by Tendo Pain. Just when all is thought to be lost, Hinata, who was following the battle with her Byakugan, steps in to face Pain.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto loses himself after seeing Hinata taken out right before his eyes. His anger  triggers the Nine Tails’ chakra to go out of control.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 地爆天星[ちばくてんせい]

REGULAR.description:
Naruto meets Minato Namikaze, the Fourth Hokage, inside his inner world. Before his death, Minato planted a fail-safe where he would appear within Naruto’s psyche should his son sprout eight tails.
Source: crunchyroll

To break the cycle of hate, Naruto heads to where the real Pain is hiding.
Source: crunchyroll

The story goes back to right before the start of the final rounds of the Chunin Exam. As Naruto trains in preparation for his upcoming match, he hears Jiraiya speak of “the Fourth Hokage’s legacy.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alla ricerca dell`eredità del Quarto Hokage (prima parte)
Big Adventure! Search for the Fourth Hokage`s Legacy - Part 1
Daibouken! Yondaime no Isan o Sagase: Zenpen
L`héritage du Quatrième du nom - 1ère Partie
大冒険! 四代目の遺産を探せ・前編

REGULAR.description:
Naruto and the others take on the oncoming challenges in order to find the secret technique and break the previous record set by the Fourth Hokage. But Naruto’s impulsive action leads the group into various troubles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alla ricerca dell`eredità del Quarto Hokage (seconda parte)
Big Adventure! Search for the Fourth Hokage`s Legacy - Part 2
Daibouken! Yondaime no Isan o Sagase: Kouhen
L`héritage du Quatrième du nom - 2ème Partie
大冒険! 四代目の遺産を探せ・後編

REGULAR.description:
Naruto comes face to face with Nagato and Konan. Naruto, wanting to confront the problem of their hate-filled ninja world, asks to hear Nagato’s side of the story before coming up with an answer.
Source: crunchyroll

To fulfill their dream, Nagato, Yahiko, and Konan walk through the war zone in search of Jiraiya, hoping to learn ninjutsu from him. After completing their training, the three form an organization with Yahiko as its leader.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Tag, an dem Pain erwachte

REGULAR.description:
Naruto remains silent after learning of Nagato’s painful past. Nagato claims true peace cannot exist in this cursed world, dismissing Jiraiya’s ideal as nothing more than wishful thinking.
Source: crunchyroll

Nagato, having decided to believe in Naruto’s word, performs his last forbidden jutsu: Gedo Art Rinne Rebirth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hero of the Leaf Village

REGULAR.description:
The Leaf Village is left in ruins in the wake of Pain’s assault on the village. While cleaning through the remains of Ninja Academy, Iruka finds an old pillar and recognizes it as a memoir from Naruto’s early years at the academy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chapitre de Konoha : Iruka, professeur novice

REGULAR.description:
Naruto spends his days competing with Sasuke, the academy’s star student, only to screw up and be the laughingstock of the class. Due to the childhood trauma of losing his parents to the Nine-Tailed Fox, Iruka finds it difficult to interact with Naruto as his student.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto takes up his classmates’ dare to venture into the forest and retrieve an item from the dead enemy ninja, unaware that the forest is still dangerous.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chapitre de Konoha : La décision d`Iruka

REGULAR.description:
An emergency council is held before the Feudal Lord of the Land of Fire. The topic is to discuss plans to rebuild the Leaf Village, and Danzo strongly urges the council to select a new Hokage to replace Tsunade.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 担当上忍はたけカカシ

REGULAR.description:
The Leaf ninja work to rebuild the Hidden Leaf Village. While helping with the restoration, Naruto and Sakura are reunited with two old friends—the carpenter Tazuna and his grandson Inari from the Land of Waves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il coraggio di Inari messo alla prova
Inari, le courage mis à l`épreuve
イナリ, 試される勇気

REGULAR.description:
Team 7 stops in a town for some rest, where they encounter a man named Tsukado who is out to avenge the death of his relative.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナルト, 仇討ち指南塾

REGULAR.description:
Gaara, recalling a past mission carried out with the Leaf’s Team 7, points out that the Leaf Village has Naruto with them.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto visits Sakura, who is caring for Tsunade. Sakura recalls an incident that took place three years before, in which she collapsed from symptoms that resembled a disease caused by a mysterious virus.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナルト・アウトブレイク

REGULAR.description:
Tenten and Neji head for the Leaf Ninja Tool Research Lab to procure ninja tools necessary for rebuilding the Leaf Village.
Source: crunchyroll

Condor, the ostrich previously captured by Team 7, now lives in a forest with baby ostriches. Since his last escape, Condor has trained himself to become a ninja ostrich.
Source: crunchyroll

After accidentally finishing off Lee’s last special youth drink, Naruto asks Guy to make more, only to learn one of its key ingredients, the Jofuku Flower, is out of stock. Naruto is determined to get the Jofuku Flower for Lee’s sake.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ああ, 青春の漢方丸

REGULAR.description:
Jiraiya takes Naruto to a village in the hopes of teaching him how to counter the Sharingan’s genjutsu attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gutsy Master and Student - The Training
Il coraggio del maestro e dell`allievo: l`allenamento
Nostalgie : Bornés, tel maître, tel disciple

REGULAR.description:
Naruto and Jiraiya attempt to save a village from Kandachi, a former right-hand man to Hanzo of the Hidden Rain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il racconto del maestro e dell`allievo
Record of the Ninja Gutsy Master and Student

REGULAR.description:
Granny Cat requests that Sasuke and Team 7 collect the last cat paw print necessary to complete the “Paw Encyclopedia.”
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto is assigned to a team led by jonin Hayama to patrol the north border of the Leaf Village. One of his teammates is Kosuke, an old man who has been a genin for over fifty years, earning him the title “Eternal Genin.”
Source: crunchyroll

A beautiful kunoichi spy named Hanare is captured for attempting to gather intel on the Hidden Leaf.
Source: crunchyroll

During the Chunin Exam, Neji rests in the medical room, having lost to Naruto. Just as Tenten comes in to check up on him, they see the Leaf Village attacked by Orochimaru and his men.
Source: crunchyroll

On his way home Naruto comes across a rock pasted with a peculiar talisman, which he tears off without thinking. That night, Naruto is surprised to find an amnesic ghost standing near his bed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`uomo che è morto due volte

REGULAR.description:
Team 7 is after a group of thieves who have stolen the precious Golden Statue from the Feudal Lord`s sister.
Source: crunchyroll

Team 7 and Team 10 are assigned to help a village that is troubled by bandits.
Source: crunchyroll

Sasuke’s jealousy of Naruto’s tremendous growth in strength causes friction between the two. Tsunade decides to give them some time apart by assigning them separate missions.
Source: crunchyroll

Team Samui of the Hidden Cloud arrive at the Leaf Village and are shocked to find it in ruins. Nonetheless, they carry out their orders to deliver the Raikage’s official letter to the Hokage, when Danzo appears and announces that he is the new Hokage.
Source: crunchyroll

Karui and Omoi of the Hidden Cloud press Naruto to give information regarding Sasuke. Naruto realizes they’re motivated by wanting to save their captured master, but decides he cannot sell out his friend. Instead, Naruto offers himself as a punching bag for Karui and Omoi to abuse to their hearts’ content.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La nuit avant le conseil des cinq Kage
La vigilia del summit dei cinque Kage

REGULAR.description:
Kage from each nation set out to attend the Five Kage Summit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aufbruch zum Treffen der fünf Kage
Les cinq Kage entrent en scène !

REGULAR.description:
To prevent the cycle of hatred bound to occur should Sasuke be killed, Naruto goes to the Raikage and begs him to forgive Sasuke, but the Raikage quickly dismisses the request.
Source: crunchyroll

Mifune calls for the formation of the Allied Shinobi Forces to counter the Akatsuki and proposes the Hokage to lead them. Meanwhile, Sai reveals Naruto’s actions to Sakura.
Source: crunchyroll

Madara, who has taken an interest in Naruto, makes a sudden appearance before Naruto and reveals the truth behind Itachi’s actions.  Meanwhile, the samurai learn of Sasuke and his team Taka’s entry into the Land of Iron, and battle ensues between the two groups.
Source: crunchyroll

The truth behind Itachi’s actions leaves Naruto, Kakashi, and Yamato in shock. Madara then goes on to reveal the eternal hate stemming from as far back as the rivalry between the two sons of the legendary Sage of the Sixth Paths and its relation to the Uchiha clan.
Source: crunchyroll

Having blocked the combined attacks of Gaara, Temari, Kankuro, and Darui with his Susano’o, Sasuke goes after Danzo.
Source: crunchyroll

The four Kage are startled by the sudden appearance of Madara Uchiha. Having sent Sasuke away to safety using the Transportation Technique, Madara unveils to the Kage his “Project Tsuki no Me.”
Source: crunchyroll

The Kage respond to Madara’s declaration of war by forming the Allied Shinobi Forces, with the Raikage as their leader.
Source: crunchyroll

Killer Bee engages in a deadly battle against Kisame, who has come to capture the Eight-Tails.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Tailed Beast vs. A Tailed Beast With no Tail
Bijuu VS O no Nai Bijuu
Démon à queue contre démon sans queue

REGULAR.description:
Naruto learns from Sai that Sakura intends to kill Sasuke with her own hands. The Sand arrives to brief the Leaf ninja about what happened at the Five Kage Summit.
Source: crunchyroll

Kakashi decides to go after Sakura to stop her, while Yamato and Naruto are ordered to return to the Leaf Village. Meanwhile, Sasuke confronts Danzo after seeing the many Sharingan embedded in his enemy’s right arm.
Source: crunchyroll

Danzo’s uncanny jutsu prevents Sasuke from landing a clean hit on his enemy. As Karin attempts to analyze Danzo’s jutsu, Madara recognizes it as Izanagi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 禁じられた瞳術[どうじゅつ]

REGULAR.description:
Danzo believes he’s won the battle against Sasuke. Little does he realize, Sasuke placed him under genjutsu before they last exchanged blows.
Source: crunchyroll

Having tracked down Sasuke’s whereabouts with Kiba’s nose, Sakura attempts to put her allies to sleep and carry out the task of killing Sasuke herself.
Source: crunchyroll

Memories from his childhood course through Naruto’s mind as he rests to recover from his hyperventilation.
Source: crunchyroll

Sakura tells Sasuke that she wishes to desert the village and join him. A skeptical Sasuke tells Sakura he will believe her if she can finish off Karin.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto reproaches Sasuke for attempting to kill Sakura. Then Sasuke reveals that he killed Danzo with his own hands. He goes on to declare his intent to purify the Uchiha clan’s name by annihilating the Hidden Leaf.
Source: crunchyroll

Years ago at the Final Valley, Sasuke told Naruto about high-level shinobi being able to understand one another just by trading blows. Having become a high-level shinobi, Naruto is now able to understand Sasuke’s heart.
Source: crunchyroll

Killer Bee returns to the Hidden Cloud Village to the delight of Omoi and Karui. He has brought Kisame’s sword, Samehada, with him. Bee believes the sword has taken a liking to him but is unaware that this is all just part of the Akatsuki’s plan.
Source: crunchyroll

The formation of the Allied Shinobi Forces is ratified by the Feudal Lords of the Five Great Nations. Each Kage returns to their village to prepare for the coming war
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Mobilisierung der fünf großen Reiche

REGULAR.description:
Naruto gathers his friends and tells them that he will defeat Sasuke alone. Meanwhile, the Elders of the Leaf officially nominate Kakashi to become the next Hokage.
Source: crunchyroll

In Mount Myoboku, Gerotora, Fukasaku, and the Great Lord Elder are debating whether to give Naruto the key to the Tetragram Seal left behind by Jiraiya, an act that could unleash the Nine Tails.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La predizione del Sommo Rospo Eremita
La prophétie du grand Ermite Ogama

REGULAR.description:
At Mount Myoboku, Naruto prepares to store Gerotora within himself, but hesitates as it also holds the potential risk of unleashing the Nine Tails on the world.
Source: crunchyroll

The denizens of the Leaf Village ready themselves for the coming of the Fourth Great Ninja War.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsunade sends out Naruto under the guise of a top-secret mission to keep him hidden away from the Akatsuki. Unfortunately, Naruto, Yamato, Gai, and Aoba are stuck at the pier due to a report of a monster attacking ships.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der junge Mann und das Meer
Le Jeune homme et la mer
The Young Man and the Ocean

REGULAR.description:
During their voyage, Naruto, Yamato, Gai, and Aoba stop at an island to recover from severe seasickness. There, they unexpectedly meet up with Sakura, Ino, and Choji, who are on an assignment to gather medical herbs for Tsunade.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto`s ship is stranded at sea due to heavy fog, when another ship suddenly appears.
Source: crunchyroll

Pirates living on an island resembling a battleship open fire on Naruto’s ship.
Source: crunchyroll

Going after Guy, who was whisked away by a giant bird, Naruto, Yamato, and Aoba arrive on an island where they spot a young woman.
Source: crunchyroll

Guy recalls the time when he and Lee celebrated Lee learning the Hidden Lotus technique.
Source: crunchyroll

Making a stop at a nearby port to stock up on supplies, Naruto buys a rare mushroom from a vegetable merchant. But soon after they set sail for their next destination, Naruto and the other crewmembers find their ship infested with poisonous mushrooms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eat or Die! Mushrooms from Hell!
Kuu ka Kuwareruka! Odoru Kinoko Jigoku
Manger ou être mangé: L`enfer des champignons dansants !
食うか食われるか!踊るキノコ地獄

REGULAR.description:
Naruto’s Shadow Clones turn against their master after feeling mistreated and overworked.
Source: crunchyroll

As he prepares for the coming war, Shikamaru begins to feel the pressure of shouldering the lives of his friends. To help ease his mind, Shikaku sends his son on a mission to Mokuzu Island where Shikamaru meets up with Naruto.
Source: crunchyroll

Hinata’s father Hiashi summons the Hyuga clan to discuss the role they will be playing in the upcoming Fourth Great Ninja War.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and the others encounter a thief who claims that he is Naruto Uzumaki of the Hidden Leaf. The real Naruto easily takes care of the imposter and hands him over to a ninja who was after the thief.
Source: crunchyroll

Konohamaru is eager to fight alongside his senior ninja in the coming war, but his young age prevents him from being assigned to the battlefield.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto meets two kunoichi ninja named Shizuka and Tokiwa from the Nadeshiko village who are seeking the student of Jiraiya.
Source: crunchyroll

At the Ninja Academy, Shino recounts the time when he failed to capture a wanted thief.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freunde, auf die man sich verlassen kann

REGULAR.description:
Tenten is helping out Lee’s training to enhance his Eight Inner Gates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ああ, 憧れの綱手様

REGULAR.description:
While taking a walk through the Leaf Village, Sai comes across some kids who remind him of Sakura and Naruto.
Source: crunchyroll

Ino, Choji, and Shikamaru run into Kosuke, an elderly genin who they saved in a previous mission.
Source: crunchyroll

Kiba trains hard to catch up to Naruto, who is now hailed as the hero of the Leaf Village, but with little success. Feeling desperate, Kiba asks Kakashi if he could train him.
Source: crunchyroll

As the Leaf ninja’s ship heads toward their final stop for supplies before entering the Land of Lightning, Yamato warns the crew to stay alert for enemies who could mimic both the appearance and chakra of their closest allies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakashi, Waga Eien no Rival yo
カカシ, 我が永遠のライバルよ

REGULAR.description:
During his final stop for supplies on an island in the Land of Water, Naruto runs into Akatsuchi and Kurotsuchi of the Hidden Stone, who are on an assignment to deliver a letter from the Tsuchikage addressed to the Mizukage.
Source: crunchyroll

After a long voyage at sea, Naruto’s ship finally arrives at the island of its destination. Before everyone can rejoice, a giant squid attacks the ship. Fortunately, the crew is saved by Killer Bee, the Eight Tails’ jinchuriki host.

titles.title: Land Ahoy! Is This the Island of Paradise?

REGULAR.description: Motoi warns Naruto that he is not yet ready to enter training to control the Tailed Beast. Undaunted, Naruto asks Motoi to tell him more about Killer Bee.

titles.title: Das Schicksal, eine Jinchu-Kraft zu sein

REGULAR.description: With Killer Bee as his new master, Naruto begins his training to control the power of a Tailed Beast. In order to do so, one must fight the Tailed Beast head on and absorb its chakra, converting it into one’s own power.

titles.title: Nur die Harten kommen in den Garten!
The Next Challenge! Naruto vs. Nine Tails!!
さらなる試練!ナルトVS九尾!!

REGULAR.description: Inside his mind, Naruto continues his battle against Nine Tails to take control of its immense power.

titles.title: Das Mädchen mit den feuerroten Haaren

REGULAR.description: Sixteen years ago, Fourth Hokage Minato Namikaze and his wife Kushina are expecting their first child, much to the delight of the young couple.
Minato is forced to use his Flying Raijin jutsu and leave his wife Kushina behind to save their newborn son, Naruto, from a masked assailant.

titles.title: Le dernier combat du quatrième du nom

REGULAR.description: Minato uses his Transportation Technique to move Nine Tails away from the Hidden Leaf Village.
Guy arrives at the Waterfall of Truth to help Naruto with his training. Instead he encounters Kisame, who has infiltrated the island to locate Naruto and Killer Bee.

titles.title: Battle in Paradise! Odd Beast vs. The Monster!
Chinjuu VS Kaijin! Rakuen no Tatakai!
Le Monstre contre la Bête ! Une bataille au paradis !
珍獣VS怪人! 楽園の戦い!

REGULAR.description: Kisame’s escape is prevented thanks to Guy’s efforts. Aoba enters Kisame’s mind to gather intel on the Akatsuki.
Madara appears in the Hidden Rain Village seeking the corpse of Nagato and his Rinnegan.
Madara uses the forbidden jutsu Izanagi to escape Konan’s Paper Bomb trap.

The Leaf and Cloud ninja prepare to relocate Naruto and Bee, as the Akatsuki may already have knowledge of their location. Aoba assigns Naruto an S-rank mission to distract him from learning about their true mission: keeping the two Jinchuriki hidden from the enemy.

titles.title: Mission top secrète de rang S

REGULAR.description: Kabuto and a reanimated Deidara attempt to grab hold of the jinchuriki, but are stopped by the Tsuchikage, who has come to protect Naruto.
The Tsuchikage and his team manage to safeguard the Jinchuriki, but at the cost of losing Yamato to the enemy.
A look back into the early years when Naruto and Sasuke first met and got to know each other.

titles.title: Housou Juushuunen Yonshuu Renzoku Tokubetsu Kikaku "Deai"
放送10周年4週連続特別企画「出会い」

REGULAR.description: During the Chunin Exam, Sasuke witnesses Naruto’s growth as a shinobi.

titles.title: Housou Juushuunen Yonshuu Renzoku Tokubetsu Kikaku "Rival"
放送10周年4週連続特別企画「ライバル」

REGULAR.description: Sasuke’s defeat to Gaara, and later Itachi, forces him to realize that he is not strong enough to get revenge against his older brother.

titles.title: Housou Juushuunen Yonshuu Renzoku Tokubetsu Kikaku "Kiretsu"
放送10周年4週連続特別企画「亀裂」

REGULAR.description: Naruto is determined to save Sasuke, who has deserted the Hidden Leaf.

titles.title: Housou Juushuunen Yonshuu Renzoku Tokubetsu Kikaku "Ribetsu"
放送10周年4週連続特別企画「離別」

REGULAR.description: The Allied Shinobi Forces are on standby, ready to confront Madara’s army of reanimated shinobi and 100,000 White Zetsu. But distrust still exists among the Allied Shinobi Forces, who were once sworn enemies until recently.

Kankuro’s commando unit enters enemy territory to set up a stronghold for the Allied Shinobi Forces. They are immediately ambushed by the Akatsuki’s own commando unit comprised of the reanimated Deidara and Sasori.
Source: crunchyroll

The Allied Shinobi Forces’ commando unit engages with the Akatsuki in the first wave of battle.
Source: crunchyroll

Under the guidance of Killer Bee, Naruto enters the final stage of training to master the Tailed Beast Bomb, a Jinchuriki’s most powerful technique.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le secret de la réincarnation des âmes

REGULAR.description:
The commando unit is in hot water as they engage the reanimated Kekkei Genkai shinobi, which include Zabuza Momochi and Haku. Luckily, Kakashi and his unit arrive in time to assist them.
Source: crunchyroll

Kakashi and his unit devise a strategy to take on the Kekkei Genkai shinobi, but it’s foiled by Kabuto, who uses the Reanimation Jutsu to summon the most powerful members of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le premier ennemi, le dernier ennemi
Saisho no Teki, Saigo no Teki
最初の敵, 最後の敵

REGULAR.description:
The Akatsuki dispatch an army of powerful reanimated shinobi and White Zetsu across the war zone, causing chaos within the Allied Shinobi Forces’ chain of command.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Brilliant Military Advisor of the Hidden Leaf

REGULAR.description:
As Darui and his First Company engage an army of White Zetsu, the remaining forces must deal with reanimated shinobi.
Source: crunchyroll

Atsui, Samui, and Darui face off against Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the legendary brothers from the Hidden Cloud, feared even by the Raikage.
Source: crunchyroll

Darui manages to seal away Ginkaku. Fueled by the rage of losing his brother, Kinkaku transforms into a monster that resembles a jinchuriki’s Tailed Beast State.
Source: crunchyroll

Ino sees Sakura falling from the sky. Although she manages to save her, the shock of the fall has left Sakura with amnesia.
Source: crunchyroll

Kankuro’s Commando Unit is cornered by Hanzo’s poison attack. Fortunately, Mifune and his Fifth Company arrive in time to provide assistance.
Source: crunchyroll

The Ino-Shika-Cho trio is ordered by Shikaku to take down the reanimated Asuma. Remembering Asuma’s final words, Shikamaru and Ino are determined to stop their former teacher.
Source: crunchyroll

Choji is unable to attack Asuma and loses his will to fight. Ino and Shikamaru try to snap Choji out of his paralysis.
Source: crunchyroll

While training in Chakra Mode, Naruto senses the presence of the Nine Tails’ chakra seeping from Kinkaku outside.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un message qui vient du cœur

REGULAR.description:
The Allied Shinobi Forces are on the verge of winning the war when Madara Uchiha appears. Madara summons the giant Gedo Statue and unleashes its devastating power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La statue Gedô passe à l`attaque

REGULAR.description:
Naruto and Killer Bee rush to the battlefield when Nine Tails suddenly speaks to Naruto inside his mind.
Source: crunchyroll

Over at the Medical Unit camp, Sakura and the other medic ninja work nonstop to treat the wounded. Neji is there to recover from overusing his Byakugan.
Source: crunchyroll

Kiba, Shino, and Hinata are sent to investigate an area where the Akatsuki are supposedly getting through. There, the three are ambushed by a White Zetsu and get separated.
Source: crunchyroll

Back at the Fifth Company’s camp, Kurotsuchi attempts to negotiate with the captive Deidara to find out Kabuto’s location, but is quickly rebuffed.
Source: crunchyroll

With many of the shinobi away serving in the Fourth Great Ninja War, the Leaf Village is left with just the mothers and children to protect it. Konohamaru is eager to guard the village but is quickly discouraged by the adults who tell him to just go about his day as usual.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsunade and the Raikage arrive to prevent Naruto and Killer Bee from joining the battle. But the two Kage fail to convince the Jinchuriki to turn back, forcing the Raikage to use extreme force.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die geheime Geschichte des ultimativen Tag-Teams
Histoire secrète: l`équipe la plus forte !
The Secret Origin of the Ultimate Tag Team!

REGULAR.description:
Fourth Raikage Ay attacks Naruto in an attempt to prevent the Jinchuriki from falling into Madara’s hands.  Ay is unwilling to listen to either Tsunade or Killer Bee’s pleas to change his mind.
Source: crunchyroll

Kakashi assigns Sai to take over for the Sealing Corps, who are recovering from sealing the reanimated shinobi. But Sai is not sure if he can handle the responsibility. Soon afterwards, the Third Company is attacked by Jinin Akebino.
Source: crunchyroll

A group of Allied Shinobi, including Omoi and Maki of the Sand, battle against several reanimated enemies. Maki recognizes one of them as Pakura, her former master who was a Sand Village hero.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`utilisatrice de Shakuton ! Pakura du village caché du Sable
User of the Scorch Style: Pakura of the Sand!
灼遁使い! 砂隠れのパクラ

REGULAR.description:
Still coping with the loss of her loved ones, Tsunade indulges in gambling and drinking. Around the same time, the Raikage Ay and his men are on a mission to steal a scroll from a certain village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce que l`on ne peut retrouver

REGULAR.description:
The Raikage Ay and his team suffer critical injuries during an enemy attack. Unwilling to sacrifice any more of his men, Ay seeks medical help from Tsunade, who just happens to be in the area.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ceux sur qui il faut parier
Der Mann, der den Einsatz wert ist

REGULAR.description:
Kakashi races to the scene where the Seven Ninja Swordsmen Kushimaru Kuriarare and Jinpachi Munashi were last sighted. Enraged by the carnage they’ve left behind, Kakashi teams up with Might Guy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 脅威, 甚八・串丸コンビ!!

REGULAR.description:
Omoi’s unit is attacked by Ameyuri Ringo of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen and loses one of Omoi’s men. Omoi attempts to avenge his comrade, but Nurui orders everyone to retreat.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and his team are assigned a mission to identify and hunt down the perpetrator of the Tonika Village massacre. It’s been a while since Naruto has had a mission, and he’s pumped to take it on.
Source: crunchyroll

While investigating the village near Tonika, Kabuto confronts Naruto. An epic battle erupts as Kabuto uses the forbidden Reanimation Jutsu against Naruto. In the meantime, Dokku and the five survivors lie low at the village.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Sakura decide to stay at Shiseru’s house overnight to help watch over the survivors. Although the children cry and miss their deceased parents, Dokku and Shiseru try hard to bring everyone together as a new family.
Source: crunchyroll

A clone possessing the Nine Tails’ chakra emerges from Naruto’s body. Seeking more power, the clone goes on a rampage, destroying everything in its path.
Source: crunchyroll

After their defeat by the Nine Tails’ clone, Naruto and Dokku are taken captive by Kabuto.
Source: crunchyroll

The legendary Ama no Hoko imbues the Nine Tails’ clone with enough power to destroy the world. Naruto is overcome by its immense power and lies unconscious.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto makes his entrance onto the battlefield and uses his sensory powers to detect and destroy the transformed White Zetsu clones. During the battle, Shikaku updates Naruto with what they currently know on Madara.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Naruto sur le champ de bataille

REGULAR.description:
Gaara leads the Fourth Company into battle against the previous Kage, including his father, the late Fourth Kazekage. The Fourth Kazekage attacks Gaara in order to determine if his son is truly worthy to be the current Kazekage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Father`s Hope, a Mother`s Love
Chichi no Omoi, Haha no Ai
Les sentiments de mon père, l`amour de ma mère
Wünsche des Vaters und Liebe der Mutter

REGULAR.description:
Naruto and Killer Bee engage in battle against the reanimated Itachi Uchiha and Nagato. Itachi learns from Naruto that Sasuke has chosen the path of vengeance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rencontre tant attendue, Naruto contre Itachi
Tsui ni Sesshoku!! Naruto VS Itachi
ついに接触!! ナルトVSイタチ

REGULAR.description:
Itachi uses the ultimate genjutsu technique Koto Amatsukami to free himself from the Reanimation Jutsu. Itachi then joins Naruto and Killer Bee to fight Nagato, who is still under Kabuto’s control.
Source: crunchyroll

The Fourth Company continue their fight against the reanimated Kage. Gaara and Ohnoki team up to hold off Second Tsuchikage Mu, while the remaining shinobi take on the Second Mizukage, who is willing to be sealed away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Mizukage, die Riesenmuschel und die Fata Morgana
The Mizukage, the Giant Clam and the Mirage

REGULAR.description:
Temari leads the attack on the Third Raikage using Wind Style, but even her strongest jutsu is not enough to penetrate the Raikage’s invincible armor.
Source: crunchyroll

Gaara and Ohnoki manage to overcome the Second Mizukage’s mirage attack. Having taken an interest in Gaara, the Second Mizukage decides to further test the young Kage’s skills.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恐怖・蒸危暴威[ジョウキボーイ]

REGULAR.description:
Shikamaru, Choji, Neji, and Kiba find themselves up against some familiar faces from the past. The Sound Ninja Four have been brought back by Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu, and they are ready to seek vengeance.
Source: crunchyroll

Shikamaru, Neji, Choji, and Kiba succeed in defeating the Sound Ninja Four. But the enemy uses the Underworld Transfer Jutsu to trap the Leaf shinobi’s souls inside a barrier.
Source: crunchyroll

Time is running out for the Leaf shinobi whose souls are trapped inside the Sound Four’s barrier. Ino and Shino exhaust their own chakra to keep their friends alive.
Source: crunchyroll

Hinata defends Neji from a White Zetsu clone while he’s recovering from an earlier fight. She then remembers the time Neji protected her the same way after she temporarily lost her sight.
Source: crunchyroll

Three years ago, Leaf Anbu Yugao Uzuki lost her lover Hayate Gekko in battle. Unable to cope with his death, Yugao has since left the Anbu and joined the Medical Corps. Meanwhile, Kabuto has reanimated Hayate.
Source: crunchyroll

Yugao is ordered by Sukui to track down the reanimated Hayate. Still shaken by her lover’s unexpected return as an enemy, Yugao manages to catch up to Hayate and his men.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto arrives to help a team of Allied Shinobi Forces led by Karui, who are struggling against a reanimated samurai. Naruto recognizes the samurai as Tatewaki, a man he met during a past mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Rang A-Mission: Wettkampf im Schloss
Mission de rang A - duel devant l’empereur

REGULAR.description:
The Leaf Shinobi succeed in bringing young lord Shu into custody, placing a disguised Naruto as his double. But Tatewaki soon uncovers Naruto’s identity and surrounds the intruder with his men.
Source: crunchyroll

Madara is prepping his new jutsu Limited Tsukuyomi, choosing Naruto as his test subject. Meanwhile, Naruto is spending his day off alone in his room. Thinking that Naruto is lonely, Lee suggests they all go to the bathhouse .
Source: crunchyroll

Might Guy arrives on the battlefield to stop a Reanimated Shinobi who he recognizes as Master Chen, the legendary Taijutsu User from the Third Great Ninja War.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der alte Mann und das Auge des Drachen
Le sage et l’Œil du Dragon
The Old Master and the Dragon`s Eye

REGULAR.description:
A reanimated boy who can control weather appears before Team Ino-Shika-Cho, Sakura, and Kiba, who are all fighting in different locations. To their surprise, the boy seems to know them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La neige après la pluie et parfois l’orage
Rain Followed by Snow, With Some Lightning
雨のち雪, ときどき雷

REGULAR.description:
The weather-controlling enemy is revealed to be Yota, a boy who came to the Leaf Village years ago and befriended the local kids, including Naruto.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and the others finally regain their lost memories regarding Yota. Years ago, the Leaf Village kids came to befriend Yota, but the adults believed the young boy was a spy and took him away for questioning.
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto reanimates an army of unknown shinobi led by Danzo’s former bodyguard Torune to retrieve the ones he lost to the Allied Forces. But aside from Torune, the reanimated shinobi are all weak and are quickly sealed away.
Source: crunchyroll

During their battle against the White Zetsu, Shino’s beetles detect the presence of another enemy. Leaving the fight to Kiba and the others, Shino goes to investigate and finds Torune preparing to unleash his forbidden jutsu.
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto reanimates Fukai to attack Killer Bee and Motoi. Fukai warns Killer Bee to escape before being taken over by Kabuto. To everyone’s surprise, Fukai releases Eight Tails’ chakra and enters Tailed Beast State.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hole in the Heart: The Other Jinchuriki
Das Loch in der Seele: Der andere Jinchuriki
Kokoro no Ana Mou Hitori no Jinchuuriki
Le vide du cœur, l’autre hôte
心の穴・もう一人の人柱力

REGULAR.description:
A reanimated Granny Chiyo attacks Kankuro and Mifune’s team. Kankuro fights back by using the human puppet of Sasori. The sight of Sasori causes Granny Chiyo to recall the painful memories that led her grandson to create his human puppets.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Soul Living Inside the Puppet

REGULAR.description:
The Allied Forces receive a report that Omoi has deserted his post, much to the Raikage’s shock. It is soon revealed that Omoi has defied orders to go save the Thundercloud Unit.
Source: crunchyroll

White Zetsu’s ability to mimic people’s appearances has wrought confusion and distrust within the Allied Shinobi Forces. Naruto arrives to assist, and using his sensory powers, he identifies all the disguised White Zetsu clones, changing the tide of the battle.
Source: crunchyroll

The reanimated shinobi appearing before Gaara and Ohnoki is revealed to be none other than Madara Uchiha himself…which raises the question of who the masked man claiming to be Madara really is.
Source: crunchyroll

The power of the reanimated Madara Uchiha far exceeds what the Allied Forces expected. Despite the difference in power, the Third Tsuchikage, Ohnoki, along with Naruto and Gaara, refuses to give up.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto and Killer Bee face off against the masked man originally thought to be Madara Uchiha, in addition to the reanimated Jinchuriki. Naruto is shocked when he recognizes one of the Jinchuriki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Maske, die nicht zerspringt, und eine geplatzte Seifenblase
The Unbreakable Mask and the Shattered Bubble
Un masque incassable et des bulles de savon
割れない仮面・割れたシャボン玉

REGULAR.description:
Naruto and Killer Bee take on the six Reanimated Jinchuriki, who’ve been equipped with the Rinnegan. Using his past experience from fighting the Six Paths of Pain, Naruto devises a plan to stop the Jinchuriki.
Source: crunchyroll

Kakashi and Guy arrive in the nick of time to back up Naruto and Killer Bee. The fight intensifies even further when three out of the six Reanimated Jinchuriki enter Tailed Beast State, forcing Naruto and the others to throw in everything they’ve got.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Four Tails, the King of Sage Monkeys

REGULAR.description:
Naruto finds himself inside Four Tails’ inner world, where he promises to free Four Tails from Madara’s control. Listening in on their conversation, Nine Tails recalls all the time he has spent sealed inside Naruto.
Source: crunchyroll

For years, Naruto was the target of Nine Tails’ undying hatred. But their time together has made Nine Tails understand Naruto more than anyone. As Naruto continues to try and free Four Tails from Madara’s control, Nine Tails begins to undergo a change.
Source: crunchyroll

Naruto uses up the last of his chakra trying to free the Tailed Beasts from Madara’s control. When all seems lost, the Nine Tails finally acknowledges Naruto as its jinchuriki and offers its help.
Source: crunchyroll

The tide of battle is slowly shifting in the Allied Forces` favor, but many are uncertain that they really stand a chance against Madara Uchiha. To help boost their spirits, Shikaku orders Inoichi to send out a message to every member of the forces.
Source: crunchyroll

Suigetsu and Jugo’s search for Sasuke leads them to one of Orochimaru’s old hideouts where they come across his research data, which could tip the outcome of the Fourth Great War. Meanwhile, Sasuke finally sets out to settle his score with Naruto.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Augen, die in die Finsternis blicken
Eyes That See in the Dark
Les yeux qui percent les ténèbres

REGULAR.description:
The Five Kage are outmatched by the real Madara Uchiha’s devastating attacks. Just when Third Tsuchikage Ohnoki is about to give up, he remembers the words of the previous Tsuchikage.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsunade leaves her post as Medic Ninja to join the other Kage in fighting Madara. Meanwhile, Sasuke goes after Itachi and learns that his brother intends on stopping Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Risks of the Reanimation Jutsu

REGULAR.description:
Sasuke and Itachi team up to stop Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu. But Kabuto’s new ability to use Nature Energy has made him a difficult target for the brothers to land their Susano’o attack.
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto attempts to bring Sasuke over to his side by pointing out that they both are fighting for the same goal: to bring down the Leaf Village. But Sasuke quickly rejects him.
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto’s past is finally revealed. As child, a woman named Nonou raised Kabuto at an orphanage in the Leaf Village. One day, Danzo and Orochimaru visit the orphanage to provide financial aid under the condition that Nonou work as their spy.
Source: crunchyroll

Kabuto’s quest to discover his true identity has led him over the years to collect, analyze, and use the abilities of all shinobi within him, including Kimimaro, the Sound Four and Orochimaru.
Source: crunchyroll

Itachi activates the Visual Jutsu Izanami to trap Kabuto’s mind. Itachi then explains to Sasuke how Izanami was originally developed to keep the Uchiha from abusing the power of Izanagi.
Source: crunchyroll

The Five Kage watch helplessly as Madara activates his Perfect Susano’o to destroy them. Meanwhile, Itachi succeeds in undoing Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu. Before fading away, Itachi reveals to Sasuke the truth behind the Uchiha massacre.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: お前をずっと愛している

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to Itachi, the Reanimation Jutsu is released, and all the Reanimated Shinobi are returned to their resting places. But to everyone’s surprise, the real Madara still remains!
Source: crunchyroll
